description: This file defines the main Home component of a React-based frontend for a Samsung TV control app. It includes UI elements such as a top menu, banner, content rails, subscription options, and a remote control overlay, and manages TV connection status and remote commands.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component for the Home page, handling connection status, navigation, UI rendering, and remote control interactions.

methods.name: img
methods.description: Helper function to generate asset image URLs based on filename.

methods.name: openRemoteOverlay
methods.description: Function to show remote control overlay.

methods.name: closeRemoteOverlay
methods.description: Function to hide remote control overlay.
